text: Alan Anthony Silvestri (born March 26, 1950) is an American composer, conductor and orchestrator. He is known for his movie and television scores. == Early life == Silvestri was born in New York City to Louis Silvestri and Sophia Phelan. His father is Italian and his mother is Irish. == Personal life == Silvestri and his wife Sandra live in Carmel Valley Village, California with Joey Silvestri, Alexandra Silvestri and James Silvestri. == Other websites == Category:1950 births Category:American movie score composers Category:Living people Category:Musicians from New York City Category:People from Teaneck, New Jersey Category:Musicians from New Jersey
title: Alan Silvestri
